Articles.Content:
That's right, we live near the Kennedy Space Center which you might think would give me an edge in this game. Nope, I blow up those Kerbals as much as the next guy! This is a great way to expand interest in the space program, which sadly around here has gotten many folks depressed and out of work. If only there were some concrete mission to take the place of the Shuttle Program. All we know is that NASA is building a big rocket to go someplace.

For now, we'll have to be content with trying to help the Kerbals realize their dream of going to space and not dying in the process. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Thanks for making this wonderful program!

Shpilkus

Viera, Florida

24 miles from Launch Complex 39 @ KSC

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launchings!

Skunky
i live in lakeland not long forum it and i love space!
